Author: staunch
Content: Forced to choose one, I'd say What Business Can Learn From Open Source (http://paulgraham.com/opensource.html). I've felt that stuff for a long time but I was never able to articulate it like PG did. Now I just give people that essay and tell them "This will help explain where I'm coming from."

Author: staunch
Title: "At Harvard they have this policy where if you pass too many classes they ask you to leave."
